name: RollPlay - INCOMPLETE
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Jam - Project is incomplete and will not run.

Roll Play is a die-building dungeon roller. Roll to cast spells, dodge enemies, and move closer to escaping your cubic prison. Strategically select your abilities for the ideal build. Combine effects and discover synergies that will have you rolling over the competition.

Choose your abilities carefully and navigate through the infested Die Dungeon! Zap enemies, crush traps, and don't DIE as you roll your way through each level using quick thinking and strategy:

  • Build your die by assigning powers to each die face.
  • WASD controls to move the die.
  • Unlock new abilities and configure your die as you kill enemies and overcome obstacles.
  • Plot and plan the roll of your die to ensure it lands just the way you want.

----
